name: Petz Kittens
description:
Adopt your very own kittens, bond with them, and help them grow into strong and healthy cats.

Features:

• Choose from a variety of cat breeds—Siamese, Persian, or munchkin
• Give your adorable baby kittens lots of love: feed them warm milk, keep them clean and warm, and help them grow.
• Kittens act in surprising ways when you play peek-a-boo or balloon games.
